title: What are the steps to stop the negative effects of the overuse of technology? - Quora

response.answer_text: Here’s the first two steps I highly suggest for anyone interested in the negative effects of the overuse of technology to take: 1. Watch the movies The Terminator and Terminator 2: Judgement Day. 2. Watch the TV series “Terminator: The Sarah Connor Chronicles This will show you where our world is headed if we don’t take some common sense steps regarding terminating research into artificial intelligence. Research into artificial intelligence is highly unnecessary and it allowed to continue, will at worst, result in the extinction of the human race, and at best, “only” make life an absolute nightmare for future generations. This is stuff that won’t directly affect me; I’m not taking the time an effort write this for my own benefit, since I won’t still be alive by the time the full scale destructive effects take place. For those of you who have children and grandchildren and don’t want them to have go through the hell that artificial intelligence will unleash on their world, you owe it to them to take those first to steps I described above. These are entertaining movies and a fascinating TV series, as well as being highly informative so even if you consider it a task to do what’s necessary so you’ll be adequately informed about the potential of artificial intelligence, it’s an exciting, interesting task. The fate of the human race is at stake, so watch what I told you to watch, and watch it carefully. They are early warning signs you’re morally obligated to watch if you care about the fate of the human race and they may be the only early warning signs you get.
